title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
ingredients: 2 slices of sourdough bread, 1 ripe avocado, salt, pepper, chili flakes, olive oil
instructions: Toast the bread until golden. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Spread on toast, sprinkle chili flakes, and serve.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 banana, 1 cup frozen berries, 1/2 cup yogurt, granola, honey
instructions: Blend banana, berries, and yogurt until smooth. Pour into a bowl, top with granola, fresh berries, and a drizzle of honey.

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice
instructions: Mix chickpeas, chopped vegetables, and feta. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Classic Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, olive oil
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, add mozzarella, and bake at 250°C for 7-10 minutes. Top with fresh basil and olive oil.
